+find %{buildroot} -name .packlist -exec %{__rm} {} \;
+
 %clean
 %{__rm} -rf %{buildroot}

-%{__make} install
-%{__rm} -rf %{buildroot}%{perl_archlib}/perllocal.pod %{buildroot}%{perl_vendorarch}/auto/*/*/.packlist
+%{__make} pure_install
 
+### Clean up buildroot
+find %{buildroot} -name .packlist -exec %{__rm} {} \;
+
 %clean
 %{__rm} -rf %{buildroot}

 %{__rm} -rf %{buildroot}

+%{__make} pure_install
 
+### Clean up buildroot

+
 %clean
 %{__rm} -rf %{buildroot}

+%{__make} pure_install
 
+### Clean up buildroot
+find %{buildroot} -name .packlist -exec %{__rm} {} \;
+
 %clean
 %{__rm} -rf %{buildroot}

+%{__make} pure_install
 
+### Clean up buildroot
+find %{buildroot} -name .packlist -exec %{__rm} {} \;
+
 %clean
 %{__rm} -rf %{buildroot}

+%{__make} pure_install
 
+### Clean up buildroot

+
 %clean
 %{__rm} -rf %{buildroot}
